value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06711v1", "title": "Pogorelov type $C^2$ estimates for sum Hessian equations", "summary": "In this paper, We establish Pogorelov type $C^2$ estimates for the admissible\nsolutions with $\\sigma_k(D^2u)$ bounded from below of Sum Hessian equations. We\nalso proved the lower bounded condition can be removed when $k = n$.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-09T09:14:48Z"}
